page.title: 19RELIGION IN OUR AREA
page.content: IN THE PAST RHONDDA WAS A STRONGHOLD FOR CHRISTIANITY.WELSH AND ENGLISH CHAPELS SPRANG UP EVERYWHERE.1904 BROUGHT REVIVAL TO THE VALLEY. DEPOPULATION AND A GENERAL DECLINE IN CHAPEL ATTENDANCES HAS NOW LED TO THE CLOSURE AND DEMOLITION OF MANY CHAPELS.THE REMAINING CHAPELS HAVE A NUCLEUS OF MEMBERS STRUGGLING TO SURVIVE.SOME CHURCHES ARE STRONGER THAN OTHERS EG. ST. MATTHEW'S CHURCH AND THE CATHOLIC CHURCH HAVE INCREASED IN NUMBER .FOUR BAPTIST CHURCHES HAVE FORMED THE UPPER RHONDDA GROUP OF BAPTIST CHURCHES _UNDER ONE MINISTER.DISILLUSIONED WITH MODERN LIFE,PEOPLE ARE SLOWLY RETURNING TO THE CHURCH,EG.THE ABOVE GROUP HAD 8 BAPTISMS RECENTLY.THERE IS A FEELING THAT REVIVAL MAY WELL BE ON THE WAY,ONCE AGAIN.
